item.title: Peloton 必须面对股东对流行病后前景的诉讼
item.description: 美国联邦上诉法院周三作出一项有分歧的裁决，称 Peloton Interactive 在 COVID-19 疫情最严重的时候掩盖了其家用健身器材的过剩库存，从而欺骗了股东，Peloton Interactive 必须面对这一诉讼。【原文：Peloton Interactive must face a lawsuit claiming it defrauded shareholders by masking excess inventory of its home exercise equipment as the worst of the COVID-19 pandemic passed, a divided federal appeals court ruled on Wednesday.】

item.title: 咖啡价格高企，J.M. Smucker 季度利润不及预期
item.description: Folgers咖啡生产商J.M. Smucker周三未能达到华尔街对其第一季度利润的预期，原因是受美国关税影响，商品成本上升。【原文：Folgers coffee maker J.M. Smucker missed Wall Street estimates for first-quarter profit on Wednesday, hurt by a rise in commodity costs as U.S. tariffs weighed.】

item.title: 巴西央行称不会通过 Pix 与市场竞争
item.description: 巴西央行金融系统组织主管雷纳托-戈麦斯（Renato Gomes）说，巴西央行运营和监管广泛使用的即时支付系统 Pix，并不是与金融或支付机构竞争。【原文：Brazil's central bank is not competing with financial or payment institutions by operating and regulating the widely used instant payments system Pix, said the bank's financial system organization director, Renato Gomes.】

item.title: 芯片制造商 GlobalFoundries 称 CHIPS 法案框架不涉及股权问题
item.description: 在美国政府入股芯片制造商英特尔（Intel）10% 的股份几天后，GlobalFoundries 周三表示，其 CHIPS 法案资金 "完好无损"，该框架不涉及任何类型的股权。【原文：GlobalFoundries said on Wednesday its CHIPS Act funding is "well intact" and the framework does not involve any type of equity, days after the U.S. government took a 10% equity stake in chipmaker Intel.】

item.title: 位于印第安纳州惠廷的英国石油公司炼油厂恢复正常运营
item.description: 据行业监测机构 IIR 周三称，英国石油公司位于印第安纳州惠廷的日产量为 44 万桶的炼油厂在上周因严重雷雨导致多个装置停运后，目前已恢复正常运营。【原文：BP's 440,000-barrel-per-day refinery in Whiting, Indiana, is back to operating at normal rates after taking multiple units offline due to a severe thunderstorm last week, industry monitor IIR said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 布拉德-辛格被任命为分拆后华纳兄弟公司的财务总监
item.description: 华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros Discovery）周三任命前媒体高管布拉德-辛格（Brad Singer）为首席财务官，负责公司明年完成分拆计划后的制片厂和流媒体业务。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery on Wednesday named former media executive Brad Singer as the chief financial officer for its studio and streaming business after completion of the company's planned separation next year.】

item.title: 英伟达为人工智能杠杆 ETF 市场的蓬勃发展奠定基调
item.description: 今年以来，人工智能炒作推动美股创下新纪录，带动了杠杆式单一股票交易所交易基金的爆炸式增长，英伟达公司（NVDA.O）周三的财报可能会对这一投机产品领域进行检验。【原文：AI hype that has helped push U.S. stocks to fresh records this year has driven an explosion in leveraged single stock exchange-traded funds, a universe of speculative products that is likely to be tested by Nvidia's NVDA.O Wednesday earnings.】

item.title: 国际联盟谴责三家中国公司的黑客活动
item.description: 由美国、美国的传统英语盟国以及包括德国、意大利和日本在内的其他国家组成的一个异常广泛的联盟，正在就三家中国公司被指控的黑客活动进行抨击。【原文：An unusually broad coalition composed of the United States, its traditional English-speaking allies, and other nations including Germany, Italy and Japan are calling out three Chinese companies over alleged hacking activity.】

item.title: 阿比埃克称，8月份墨西哥超过美国成为巴西牛肉第二大目的地国
item.description: 巴西牛肉游说团体 Abiec 周三表示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普于 8 月 6 日对巴西牛肉征收关税，影响了这个世界最大出口国的出货量之后，墨西哥已取代美国成为巴西牛肉的第二大进口国。【原文：Mexico has overtaken the U.S. as the second largest importer of Brazil's beef after the imposition of tariffs by President Donald Trump on August 6 affected shipments from the world's largest exporter, Brazilian beef lobby Abiec said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 达美航空公司支付 7875 万美元解决燃油倾销诉讼
item.description: 达美航空公司（Delta Air Lines）同意支付 7875 万美元，以解决 2020 年燃料倾倒事件引发的集体诉讼，该事件导致加利福尼亚州洛杉矶县和奥兰治县数以万计的财产（包括住宅和学校）被淹没。【原文：Delta Air Lines agreed to pay $78.75 million to resolve a class action lawsuit over a 2020 fuel dump that doused tens of thousands of properties, including homes and schools, in Los Angeles and Orange counties in California.】

item.title: 乌克兰相信波兰将继续在前线资助 "星链 "计划
item.description: 乌克兰副总理表示，他对波兰继续为乌克兰提供 30,000 套 Starlink 互联网系统资金的解决方案充满信心，此前波兰表示在总统否决后可能不再有能力支付这些系统的费用。【原文：Ukraine's deputy prime minister said he was confident of a solution to continue Poland's funding of 30,000 Starlink internet systems for Ukraine, after Poland said it might no longer be able to pay for them following a presidential veto.】

item.title: 备忘录显示，随着摩根大通扩充技术团队，Ofer Harduf 从风险投资公司重新加入摩根大通
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份内部备忘录，摩根大通从风险投资公司 Fifth Wall 重新聘用了 Ofer Harduf，以继续加强其技术团队。【原文：JPMorgan Chase has rehired Ofer Harduf from venture capital firm Fifth Wall as the bank continues to bolster its technology team, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 人类学成立国家安全顾问委员会，指导政府使用人工智能
item.description: 人工智能公司Anthropic于本周三成立了国家安全与公共部门咨询委员会，旨在随着人工智能在国防和战略规划中的作用日益重要，加深与华盛顿及盟国政府的联系。【原文：Artificial intelligence company Anthropic launched a National Security and Public Sector Advisory Council on Wednesday, aiming to deepen ties with Washington and allied governments as AI becomes increasingly central to defense and strategic planning.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，随着收入增长，TikTok 所有者 ByteDance 将估值定为超过 3300 亿美元
item.description: 三位知情人士透露，短视频应用 TikTok 的所有者字节跳动公司（ByteDance）将启动一项新的员工股票回购计划，在收入持续增长的推动下，这家中国科技巨头的估值将超过 3300 亿美元。【原文：ByteDance, the owner of short-video app TikTok, is set to launch a new employee share buyback that will value the Chinese technology giant at more than $330 billion, driven by continued revenue growth, said three people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 亚马逊将把公司薪酬结构和福利扩展至全食员工
item.description: 亚马逊公司将把其企业员工计划（包括薪酬结构和福利）扩展到旗下全食连锁超市的美国企业员工，旨在更紧密地整合其食品杂货业务。【原文：Amazon.com will extend its corporate staff programs, including pay structure and benefits, to U.S. corporate employees at its Whole Foods chain of supermarkets, aiming to integrate its grocery businesses more closely.】

item.title: 智利埃斯孔迪达矿业工会警告无人驾驶卡车事故频发
item.description: 必和必拓公司位于智利的埃斯孔迪达矿是世界上最大的铜矿，该矿的一个工会在周三的一份声明中说，最近发生的两起涉及自动驾驶卡车的事故引发了人们对安全问题的担忧。【原文：A workers' union at BHP's Escondida mine in Chile, the world's largest copper mine, in a statement on Wednesday said two recent accidents involving autonomous trucks are raising safety concerns.】

item.title: 乌克兰将 "无价 "的数字化战场数据宝库视为获得西方支持的关键
item.description: 乌克兰副总理表示，乌克兰正在研究如何与盟国共享战场数据，并称大量存储的信息是基辅的 "底牌 "之一，可以在与友好国家谈判支持时加强自己的地位。【原文：Ukraine is looking at how to share battlefield data with allies, the country's deputy prime minister said, calling the vast trove of stored information one of Kyiv's "cards" to strengthen its position as it negotiates support from friendly countries.】

item.title: 人工智能应用推动对 Atlas 云数据库的需求，MongoDB 大幅上涨
item.description: 数据库软件公司MongoDB称，随着越来越多的客户在该平台上构建人工智能应用，其Atlas云服务的使用率不断提高，MongoDB股价周三大涨约31%。【原文：Shares of MongoDB surged about 31% on Wednesday after the database software firm said its Atlas cloud service was seeing increasing usage as more customers build AI applications on the platform.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，在激烈的音乐流媒体竞争中，苹果公司在广播电台大展拳脚
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，苹果公司将在全球家庭扬声器和联网汽车网络上发布其精心策划的广播电台，以扩大其音乐服务的覆盖范围。【原文：Apple will distribute its curated radio stations on a global network of home speakers and connected cars, in a push to extend the reach of its music service, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美联储主席威廉姆斯称需要观察数据表现才能考虑 9 月减息 - CNBC
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）周三表示，利率很可能会在某个时候下降，但决策者需要看即将公布的经济数据显示了什么，才能决定在9月16-17日的会议上降息是否合适。【原文：New York Federal Reserve Bank President John Williams said on Wednesday it is likely interest rates can fall at some point but policymakers will need to see what upcoming data indicate about the economy to decide if it's appropriate to make a cut at the September 16-17 meeting.】

item.title: 瑞安航空预计波音将在 10 月前将 737 的月产量提高到 42 架
item.description: 瑞安航空公司首席执行官迈克尔-奥利里（Michael O'Leary）周三告诉记者，该公司预计波音公司将在 10 月份之前把 737 喷气式飞机的月产量从 38 架提高到 42 架。【原文：Ryanair expects that Boeing will boost its monthly output of 737 jets to 42 per month from 38 by October, the airline's chief executive Michael O'Leary told journalists on Wednesday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯将 2025 年经济增长预期从 2.5%下调至 1.5
item.description: 俄罗斯财政部长安东-西卢安诺夫（Anton Siluanov）周三对总统弗拉基米尔-普京说，由于为降低通货膨胀率而实施的高利率抑制了借贷，俄罗斯2025年的经济增长将放缓至1.5%，远低于早先预测的2.5%。【原文：Russia sees economic growth in 2025 slowing to 1.5%, far below the earlier 2.5% forecast, as high interest rates imposed to reduce inflation have stifled borrowing, Finance Minister Anton Siluanov told President Vladimir Putin on Wednesday.】

item.title: T-Mobile 下注 "超级移动 "计划吸引企业客户
item.description: 美国无线网络供应商 T-Mobile 周三发布了新的 "SuperMobile "计划，该计划提供卫星连接并将延迟降到最低，以增加企业客户。【原文：U.S. wireless network provider T-Mobile on Wednesday unveiled its new "SuperMobile" plan, which offers satellite connectivity and minimized latency, as it looks to add enterprise clients.】

item.title: Sompo 控股公司将以 35 亿美元收购 Aspen 保险公司
item.description: 日本 Sompo 控股公司周三表示，该公司将以约 35 亿美元的价格收购在纽约上市的 Aspen 保险控股公司，这是日本金融公司最近一次大手笔的海外收购。【原文：Japan's Sompo Holdings said on Wednesday that it will acquire New York-listed Aspen Insurance Holdings for around $3.5 billion, in the latest big ticket overseas acquisition by a Japanese financial firm.】

item.title: 据 SZ 报道，德国银行因欺诈问题停止了 100 亿欧元的 PayPal 支付业务
item.description: 据《Sueddeutsche Zeitung 报》周三报道，由于担心欺诈问题，德国银行阻止了价值超过 100 亿欧元（约合 117 亿美元）的 PayPal 支付。【原文：German banks blocked PayPal payments worth more than 10 billion euros ($11.7 billion) due to concerns about fraud, the Sueddeutsche Zeitung newspaper reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 莫斯科法院以未遵守俄罗斯法律为由对 Pinterest 和 Twitch 处以罚款
item.description: 俄罗斯一家法院周三在其 Telegram 频道上表示，已对社交网站 Pinterest 和 Twitch 分别处以违反当地互联网法规的罚款。【原文：A Russian court has fined social networking sites Pinterest and Twitch in separate cases for violating local internet regulations, the court said on Wednesday on its Telegram channel.】

item.title: 美国财政部长贝森特：美国无意入股英伟达
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周三表示，美国 "不会 "入股芯片制造商英伟达（Nvidia）。【原文：A U.S. stake in chipmaker Nvidia is "not on the table" Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 印尼敦促 TikTok 和 Meta 针对有害网络内容采取行动
item.description: 印度尼西亚一名政府官员周三表示，由于虚假信息在网上传播，印尼已传唤 Meta Platforms Inc、ByteDance 的 TikTok 和其他社交媒体平台的代表，命令他们加强内容审核。【原文：Indonesia has summoned representatives of Meta Platforms Inc , ByteDance's TikTok and other social media platforms, ordering them to boost content moderation as disinformation has spread online, a government official said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Blackstone 计划耗资 50 亿美元扩建西班牙数据中心项目
item.description: 美国资产管理公司 Blackstone 正寻求扩大其在西班牙阿拉贡建设数据中心的计划项目，将向该地区追加 43 亿欧元（50.3 亿美元）的投资，力争使其成为主要的云计算中心。【原文：U.S. asset manager Blackstone is looking to expand its planned project to build data centres in Spain's Aragon, with an additional investment of 4.3 billion euros ($5.03 billion) in the region striving to become a major cloud computing hub.】

item.title: Abercrombie & Fitch上调年度销售预期
item.description: Abercrombie & Fitch 周三上调了年度销售预期，看好其 Hollister 品牌连衣裙和牛仔裤的强劲需求，因为购物者会优先考虑时尚服饰的消费，而不会受到价格上涨的影响。【原文：Abercrombie & Fitch raised its annual sales forecast on Wednesday, betting on robust demand for its Hollister brand of dresses and jeans as shoppers prioritize spending on trendy apparel undeterred by price hikes.】
